subject: Order never confirmed
description_text:
Hey I ordered a shifter and a handbrake from you guys last week and never
got any kind of confirmation email or text or anything but my account was
charged for the order… just wanted to make sure you guys have an order in
for Kobe Stadel coming to Manhattan ks… any kind of confirmation would be
great thanks!

conversations.body_text: Hi Kobe Stadel,  Please provide the order date and time, and I will help you check it.

It was Jan 7 at around 12-2 pm range central time

On Sun, Jan 11, 2026 at 6:11 PM service@simsonn.com
Just checking in to see if you had found anything?

REACHING OUT AGAIN IN REGARDS TO MY ORDER THAT WAS NEVER CONFIRMED... ANY
UPDATES??
